data.name: RPGScenery - Campground
data.detailed_description:
This high-altitude camp is located in a valley surrounded by columnar-like mountains and is half-surrounded by a lake formed by rainwater flowing down from them. The water has dug the soft rocks creating passages and caves everywhere.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
data.about_the_game:
This high-altitude camp is located in a valley surrounded by columnar-like mountains and is half-surrounded by a lake formed by rainwater flowing down from them. The water has dug the soft rocks creating passages and caves everywhere.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
